Title: DayView2
Description: Code based on DayView Calendar (https://calendar.codeplex.com/) which no longer seems to be activly developed.
HomeWiki:
This project has moved to https://github.com/k3ldar/DayView2

 

DayView2

Based on DayView Calendar (https://calendar.codeplex.com/) which has been extended to add extra functionality including:

  • User defined Working Hours (fired by an event)
  • Built in Print Method
  • Owner draw events for drawing on Header and Appointments
  • Ability to have multiple columns for the same day (i.e. different people)
  • Couple of new Renderers
  • New properties.


Plus quite a few other changes.

 

Why? When I was after a calendar control I found DayView, however, it did not seem to be in active development any more, so I forked the code off which is now activly developed and freely available for others.
